title: 2012년 Tong Xiong v. Tom Felker 사건
summary: 미국 USA, Federal 법원 판결 사건. 사건명: Tong Xiong v. Tom Felker. 판결일: 2012-06-05. 법원: Court of Appeals for the Ninth Circuit.
description:
## 사건 정보

**사건명**: TONG XIONG, Petitioner-Appellant, v. Tom FELKER, Warden; Attorney General for the State of California, Respondents-Appellees
**판결일**: 2012-06-05
**법원**: Court of Appeals for the Ninth Circuit
**관할**: USA, Federal

**판사**: John, Margaret, McKEOWN, Milan, Noonan, Smith

## 변호인

Stephanie M. Adraktas, Berkeley, CA, for the petitioner-appellant., Kamala D. Harris, Michael P. Farrell, Tami M. Krenzin, Kenneth N. Sokoler, California Department of Justice, Sacramento, CA, for the respondents-appellees.

## 인용

- 681 F.3d 1067

## 판결문 요약

                    FOR PUBLICATION
  UNITED STATES COURT OF APPEALS
       FOR THE NINTH CIRCUIT

TONG XIONG,                              
              Petitioner-Appellant,              No. 09-16830
                v.                                 D.C. No.
TOM FELKER, Warden; ATTORNEY                   2:07-cv-02689-
GENERAL FOR THE STATE OF                          JAM-CHS
CALIFORNIA,                                        OPINION
            Respondents-Appellees.
                                         
        Appeal from the United States District Court
            for the Eastern District of California
         John A. Mendez, District Judge, Presiding

                  Submitted March 12, 2012*
                   San Francisco, California

    Before: John T. Noonan, M. Margaret McKeown, and
             Milan D. Smith, Jr., Circuit Judges.

    Opinion by Judge Milan D. Smith, Jr., Circuit Judge;
                 Dissent by Judge Noonan




  *The panel unanimously concludes this case is suitable for decision
without oral argument. See Fed. R. App. P. 34(a)(2).

mento, California, for the respondents-appellees.
